title: holeya horagihane
sahitya:
holeya horagihane UroLagillave shrI hariya smaraNeyanu ballavaru pELi


caraNam 1    shIlavanu kai goNDu naDesadAtane holeya pELida hari katheya kELadava holeya 
ALAgi arasange kEDu bagevava holeya sULeyanu kAmisuva shuddha holeya
    caraNam 2    koNDa sAlagaLannu tiddadAtane holeya laNDatanadali naDeva bhaNDa holeya 
uNDa manegeraDannu bagevAtane holeya heNDadiya ij-cheyava hEDi holeya
    caraNam 3    iddAga dAna dharmava mADadava holeya maddikki kolluvava mAri holeya 
baddhavAda nayanuDi illadAdane holeya shuddha tAnemba shuNTha holeya
    caraNam 4    Ase mAtanu koTTu bhASe tappuva holeya lEsu upakAragaLa mADadava holeya 
mOsadali jIvanava munidu keDisuva holeya hasiya pogaLuvanobba hucca holeya
    caraNam 5    aridu AcAravanu naDesadAdane holeya para satige aLugidava pApi holeya 
guru hariyanu namisadAdane holeya purandara viTTalana neneyadava holeya
